requirements.description: The system shall mount OneDrive as a native Linux filesystem using FUSE.
requirements.rationale: Essential for providing filesystem access to OneDrive content.

requirements.description: The system shall support standard file operations (read, write, create, delete, rename).
requirements.rationale: Basic functionality required for any filesystem.

requirements.description: The system shall support standard directory operations (list, create, delete, rename).
requirements.rationale: Basic functionality required for any filesystem.

requirements.description: The system shall download files on-demand when accessed rather than syncing all files.
requirements.rationale: Core feature that differentiates OneMount from traditional sync clients.

requirements.description: The system shall cache file metadata to improve performance.
requirements.rationale: Necessary for acceptable performance with remote storage.

requirements.description: The system shall handle file conflicts between local and remote changes.
requirements.rationale: Prevents data loss when conflicts occur.

requirements.description: The system shall cache thumbnails for quick file previews.
requirements.rationale: Improves user experience by providing fast access to file previews without downloading the entire file.

requirements.description: The system shall use Microsoft Graph API's direct thumbnail endpoint to retrieve thumbnails without downloading the original file.
requirements.rationale: Optimizes performance and reduces bandwidth usage by retrieving thumbnails directly from the API.

requirements.description: The system shall use subscription-based change notifications to receive real-time updates from OneDrive.
requirements.rationale: Improves performance and reduces API calls by receiving push notifications instead of polling for changes.

requirements.description: The system shall authenticate with Microsoft accounts using OAuth 2.0.
requirements.rationale: Required for secure access to OneDrive resources.

requirements.description: The system shall securely store authentication tokens.
requirements.rationale: Prevents unauthorized access to user data.

requirements.description: The system shall automatically refresh authentication tokens when they expire.
requirements.rationale: Ensures uninterrupted service without requiring frequent re-authentication.

requirements.description: The system shall support re-authentication when refresh tokens are invalid.
requirements.rationale: Necessary for handling token revocation or expiration.

requirements.description: The system shall provide access to previously accessed files when offline.
requirements.rationale: Essential for usability when network connectivity is unavailable.

requirements.description: The system shall cache file content for offline access.
requirements.rationale: Required to enable offline functionality.

requirements.description: The system shall automatically detect network connectivity changes.
requirements.rationale: Improves user experience by adapting to connectivity changes.

requirements.description: The system shall synchronize changes made offline when connectivity is restored.
requirements.rationale: Ensures data consistency after offline operations.

requirements.description: The system shall provide a command-line interface for mounting and configuration.
requirements.rationale: Essential for basic operation and scripting.

requirements.description: The system shall provide a graphical user interface for mounting and configuration.
requirements.rationale: Improves usability for non-technical users.

requirements.description: The system shall display file status and synchronization information.
requirements.rationale: Helps users understand the state of their files.

requirements.description: The system shall provide system tray integration for status indication.
requirements.rationale: Provides convenient access to status information.

requirements.description: The system shall provide a statistics command to analyze OneDrive content metadata.
requirements.rationale: Enables users to understand their OneDrive content without mounting.

requirements.description: The system shall analyze file type distribution in the statistics command.
requirements.rationale: Helps users understand what types of files are stored in OneDrive.

requirements.description: The system shall analyze directory depth statistics in the statistics command.
requirements.rationale: Provides insights into the folder structure complexity.

requirements.description: The system shall analyze file size distribution in the statistics command.
requirements.rationale: Helps users identify large files consuming storage space.

requirements.description: The system shall analyze file age information in the statistics command.
requirements.rationale: Enables users to identify old files that may be candidates for archiving or deletion.

requirements.description: The system shall provide a D-Bus interface for file status updates.
requirements.rationale: Enables real-time status updates without polling.

requirements.description: The system shall expose methods for getting file status through the D-Bus interface.
requirements.rationale: Allows applications to query file status efficiently.

requirements.description: The system shall emit signals for file status changes through the D-Bus interface.
requirements.rationale: Enables applications to receive real-time notifications.

requirements.description: The system shall integrate with the Nemo file manager to display OneDrive in the sidebar.
requirements.rationale: Improves user experience for Nemo file manager users.

requirements.description: The system shall display file status icons in the Nemo file manager.
requirements.rationale: Helps users understand file status visually.

requirements.description: The system shall fall back to extended attributes if D-Bus is not available.
requirements.rationale: Ensures compatibility with existing applications.

requirements.description: The system shall provide a method logging framework for debugging.
requirements.rationale: Improves debugging capabilities for developers.

requirements.description: The system shall log method entry and exit with parameters and return values.
requirements.rationale: Enables detailed analysis of method execution.

requirements.description: The system shall include execution duration in method logs.
requirements.rationale: Helps identify performance bottlenecks.

requirements.description: The system shall minimize network requests to improve performance.
requirements.rationale: Reduces latency and bandwidth usage.

requirements.description: The system shall use concurrent operations where appropriate.
requirements.rationale: Improves performance for multiple file operations.

requirements.description: The system shall implement efficient caching to reduce API calls.
requirements.rationale: Reduces latency and improves user experience.

requirements.description: The system shall support chunked downloads for large files.
requirements.rationale: Enables handling of large files efficiently.

requirements.description: The system shall store authentication tokens with appropriate file permissions.
requirements.rationale: Prevents unauthorized access to tokens.

requirements.description: The system shall use HTTPS for all API communications.
requirements.rationale: Ensures secure transmission of data.

requirements.description: The system shall not expose authentication tokens to non-privileged users.
requirements.rationale: Prevents token theft and unauthorized access.

requirements.description: The system shall provide clear error messages.
requirements.rationale: Helps users understand and resolve issues.

requirements.description: The system shall integrate with the Linux desktop environment.
requirements.rationale: Provides a seamless user experience.

requirements.description: The system shall provide documentation for installation and usage.
requirements.rationale: Enables users to effectively use the system.

requirements.description: The system shall handle network errors and retry operations.
requirements.rationale: Ensures robustness in unreliable network conditions.

requirements.description: The system shall recover gracefully from crashes.
requirements.rationale: Prevents data loss and improves user experience.

requirements.description: The system shall maintain data integrity during synchronization.
requirements.rationale: Prevents corruption or loss of user data.

requirements.description: The system shall handle API rate limiting gracefully.
requirements.rationale: Prevents service disruption due to API limitations.

requirements.description: The system shall use QuickXORHash for file integrity verification.
requirements.rationale: Ensures file integrity by using Microsoft's recommended hashing algorithm for OneDrive.

requirements.description: The system shall follow Go's standard project layout.
requirements.rationale: Improves code organization and maintainability.

requirements.description: The system shall include comprehensive test coverage.
requirements.rationale: Ensures code quality and facilitates future changes.

requirements.description: The system shall use structured logging for debugging.
requirements.rationale: Facilitates troubleshooting and monitoring.

requirements.description: The system shall document public APIs with godoc-compatible comments.
requirements.rationale: Improves code understanding and maintainability.
